name: Epic Talent Show
description:
You Are A Host At A Talent Show Deciding If People Are Good Or Not,                                                                                                                                                                                                      

My Hit Game On Scratch Now On Itch. Not Much To Say, 

Also I had to town down the trash talking so i might make a remastered version where they actually talk trash. and now it feels kiddie

Also Credit To Scratch As They Were The Engine And Did All Of The Sprites
